casebody.data:
172 A.3d 1079 MTK FOOD SERVICES, INC., PLAINTIFF, v. SIRIUS AMERICA INSURANCE COMPANY, DEFENDANTS. (ARCHER & GREINER, P.C., AND RICHARD GRUNGO, JR., ESQ.—MOVANTS)

M-256 September Term 2017

080034 November 2, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Appellate Division to consider on the merits.
